§ 1012. Responsibilities of Library of Congress Subject to section 552 of this title, the Administrator shall provide for the filing with the Library of Congress of at least 8 copies of each report made by each advisory committee and, where appropriate, background papers prepared by consultants. The Librarian of Congress shall establish a depository for the reports and papers and make them available for public inspection and use. (Pub. L. 117–286, § 3(a), Dec. 27, 2022, 136 Stat. 4204.)
